items.title: A way to get long an AI play while keeping a margin of safety in case there's more volatility
items.description: Tony Zhang describes a cash-secured put strategy on Lam Research.

items.title: JPMorgan picks the stock winners and losers after cheap DeepSeek upends AI trade
items.description: JPMorgan highlighted cloud storage firm Snowflake and semiconductor manufacturer Broadcom as potential DeepSeek beneficiaries.

items.title: Wall Street sees a buying opportunity in Chipotle pullback
items.description: Shares in the burrito chain fell after Chipotle's full-year financial guidance disappointed investors.

items.title: Stocks that split double the market's return. Bank of America names who's next
items.description: Jared Woodard of Bank of America Securities pointed out that companies are splitting their stock at a pace that hasn't been seen in more than ten year...

items.title: Leerink upgrades this beaten-down biotech stock, says investors should buy the dip
items.description: Analyst David Risinger upgraded shares to outperform. He also raised his price target to $834 from $762.
